posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have the following well-centered T206s available for sale:

Joss (HOF)--no creases, small smudge mark on back  $100.00 SOLD
Bates--light wrinkle from right border to the hat $28.00 SOLD
Gray--crease across the pants, and wrinkle in the red background above the player's head $25.00 SOLD
Rhoades--no creases, trimmed bottom edge $25.00 SOLD

Paypal is okay. Money order or personal check okay. Shipping Free.

Email me if you want them.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
I'll take the Joss and Rhoades.  PM sent.
Email sent for the Bates and Gray.

All four cards are sold.

Thanks,

Joe
